subject: World of Warcraft - The Black Temple Patch is Coming!
body:
World of Warcraft - The Patch is Coming!




















	  The huge World of Warcraft 2.1.0 patch is expected any day now, adding the Black Temple, Ethereum Prison, Skettis, Nether Drakes and many more fixes and gameplay tweaks. Want the patch as soon as it's available? Don't wait -- FilePlanet.com will have the patch the moment it's ready for full download! 

The Patch is Coming Soon to FilePlanet:
http://www.fileplanet.com






GET IT FIRST!


FilePlanet Subscribers can reserve the patch in advance for Automatic Download: 








GET CAUGHT UP WITH PREVIOUS PATCHES

Full Patch (Retail to v1.12)
Upgrade (1.12 to 2.0.3)
Patch (2.0.3 to 2.0.5)
Patch (2.0.5 to 2.0.6)
Patch (2.0.6 to 2.0.7)
Patch (2.0.7 - 2.0.8)
Patch (2.0.8 - 2.0.10)
Patch (2.0.10 to 2.0.12)
Visit the Patches Directory for International Versions
